ServicesPage.heroDesc: Comprehensive AI solutions tailored to drive innovation, efficiency, and growth in your enterprise.

consulting.title: AI Consulting & Strategy
consulting.description: Navigate the complex landscape of artificial intelligence with our expert guidance. We help you identify high-impact opportunities, assess technical feasibility, and create a roadmap for successful AI adoption.

automation.title: Business Process Automation
automation.description: Transform your operations by automating repetitive tasks and workflows. We build intelligent systems that reduce manual effort, minimize errors, and free up your team for strategic work.

agents.title: Custom AI Agents & Chatbots
agents.description: Deploy specialized AI agents that understand your business context. From 24/7 customer support to internal knowledge retrieval, our custom agents deliver accurate and personalized interactions.

marketing.title: AI-Powered Marketing Systems
marketing.description: Supercharge your marketing efforts with generative AI. Create personalized content at scale, optimize ad spend with predictive analytics, and engage customers with hyper-targeted campaigns.

executive-branding.title: AI Executive Branding
executive-branding.description: Scale your thought leadership without trading your time. We build personalized AI models that capture your unique voice, enabling you to publish consistent, high-impact professional insights across all channels.

corporate-comms.title: Corporate Comms Automation
corporate-comms.description: Streamline your organization's internal and external messaging. Whether it's press releases, internal memos, or stakeholder updates, our AI systems ensure perfect tonal consistency and rapid deployment.

crisis-management.title: AI Crisis & Reputation Defense
crisis-management.description: Protect your brand narrative in real-time. Our sentinel models monitor global sentiment 24/7, detecting potential crises before they spiral and generating molecularly precise response strategies to neutralize negative PR.

global-localization.title: Global Content Localization
global-localization.description: Publish your professional message to the world, instantly. We use context-aware neural translation to adapt your content for 100+ languages, preserving your unique brand voice and cultural nuance in every market.

express-video.title: Express AI Video Production
express-video.description: Need a high-quality promo video in 2 hours? We leverage tools like Suno, Kling, Pika, and HeyGen to deliver studio-grade 20-second spots starting at just $25.

rapid-website.title: Same-Day AI Web Launch
rapid-website.description: Get a professional, SEO-ready website in 24 hours. We combine Hostinger performance, Avada flexibility, and generative AI content to deliver a market-ready presence starting at $150.

mini-automation.title: AI Automation Mini Setup
mini-automation.description: Jumpstart your efficiency for just $100. We set up your essential automated workflows for social media and sales, turning your passive channels into active growth engines.

business-starter.title: AI Business Starter Kit
business-starter.description: Launch your brand today for just $500. We provide everything you need to go from zero to one: Logo, visual assets, landing page, promo video, and a 7-day content strategy.

AboutPage.heroTitle: Pioneering the Future of Artificial Intelligence

AboutPage.leadershipDesc: Meet the visionaries driving Nexa-Sphere forward.
AboutPage.missionDesc1: At Nexa-Sphere, our mission is to democratize access to advanced artificial intelligence. We believe that AI shouldn't be a black box reserved for tech giants.
AboutPage.missionDesc2: We strive to build transparent, ethical, and highly effective AI systems that solve real-world problems and drive sustainable growth for our clients.
AboutPage.whyDesc: We don‚Äôt just write code; we build partnerships.

reasons.r1_desc: We're not just about technology; but about creating systems that solve real problems. It's about returning time to people so they can focus on what they do best: creating, leading, and innovating.
reasons.r2_desc: We don't believe in one-size-fits-all. Every solution is custom-architected for your needs.
reasons.r3_desc: We prioritize safety, privacy, and transparency in every model we deploy.

AgencyOfferPage.faqSubtitle: Everything you need to know before getting started.

faq.q1: What do I need to start with any of the packages?
faq.a1: We just need you to complete a brief form with information about your business, target audience, main offer, and social media links. With that, our team can start working immediately.
faq.q2: Can I review the content before it's published?
faq.a2: Yes. We always send scripts, copy, drafts, and videos in a preliminary version for your review. You can request reasonable adjustments until the content is fully aligned with your brand.
faq.q3: What platforms are covered in the packages?
faq.a3: All packages are optimized for TikTok, Instagram Reels, and Facebook Reels. In advanced plans, we can adapt formats for YouTube Shorts, vertical ads, or any other short video platform.
faq.q4: Who does the voice-over and scripts?
faq.a4: We have professional scriptwriters and voice-over artists. Growth Accelerator and above include human voice-over (male or female). If you prefer high-quality AI, that is also possible.
faq.q5: What happens if I don't like the result of the first video?
faq.a5: Our goal is for you to be delighted. That's why we make necessary adjustments to the script, copy, pacing, visual style, or voice until it meets the quality standard you expect (within the scope of the contracted package).
faq.a6: Of course. You can start with Social Ignite and then upgrade to Growth Accelerator or Market Dominator whenever you want to increase your production and results. Scalability is part of the strategy.
faq.a7: No one can guarantee specific sales, but we do guarantee: Professional content, Optimized for conversion, Designed with proven digital marketing strategies, and Adapted to current platform behavior. This significantly increases your chances of growth.
faq.q8: How is payment and billing handled?
faq.a8: Payment can be made via card, bank transfer, or other secure methods. For monthly packages like Market Dominator, we set up recurring billing so your production never stops.
faq.q9: How soon do I receive my videos or content?
faq.a9: It depends on the package: Social Ignite ‚Üí 48 hours. Growth Accelerator ‚Üí 3 to 5 days. Market Dominator ‚Üí Continuous monthly production. SV Elite System ‚Üí Timeline agreed upon based on project scope. We always work with maximum efficiency and punctuality.
faq.q10: Can I use my own clips, photos, or materials?
faq.a10: Yes. You can send us your own materials and we will use them to reinforce your visual identity. We can also generate content from scratch with our own material, premium stock, and/or AI.
faq.a11: Yes. All videos include royalty-free music or music with a valid commercial license. You will never have problems with copyright claims.
faq.q12: Do you offer content in English and Spanish?
faq.a12: Yes. We can create all your content: 100% in Spanish, 100% in English, or a Bilingual version. Ideal for businesses selling in the US, LATAM, or both markets.

hero.title: The customer experience platform that never sleeps
hero.subtitle: Transform your support with an AI that effectively resolves 80% of inquiries instantly. seamless integration, human-like understanding, and enterprise-grade security.

feature1.title: A centralized command center for customer success
feature1.subtitle: Manage every interaction from a single, intuitive dashboard. Whether it's live chat, email, or social messaging, Nexi unifies your communication channels so your team can focus on what matters‚Äîbuilding relationships.

feature2.title: Engage visitors at the perfect moment
feature2.subtitle: Predictive engagement triggers chat invitations based on visitor behavior. Turn passive browsers into active leads with personalized, AI-driven greetings that feel undeniably human.

feature3.title: Support that scales infinitely
feature3.subtitle: Eliminate wait times. Nexi instantly answers common questions, processes returns, and schedules appointments 24/7. When things get complex, it seamlessly hands off to your human agents with full context.

integrations.title: Integrates with your existing stack
integrations.subtitle: Connect Nexi with the tools you already use. Two-click integrations for CRM, Ticketing, and E-commerce platforms.

analytics.title: Data-driven insights for growth
analytics.subtitle: Monitor sentiment, resolution times, and conversion rates in real-time. Make informed decisions to optimize your customer journey.
